decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposal contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and numbered Planning Statement, Design and Access Statement, Location Plan, S_BB_JA12_001, E_E_JA12_001-, E_S_JA12_001, Received 21 February 2013 
E_N_JA12_001A, E_W_G200_001A, P_01_JA12_001A, P_02_JA12_001A, P_03_JA12_001A, P_RF_JA12_001A, E_W_G200_002A, P_01_G200_002A, Received 27 March 2013 
P_00_JA12_001B, P_00_G200_002B, Received 6 June 2013 
Planning Letter, E_E_G200_002A, E_N_G200_002B, P_02_G200_002B, P_03_G200_002A, P_RF_G200_002B, Received 18 August 2013 and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby development hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - The existing cycle stands at the front of the building shall be maintained and available for use at all times, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - During construction there shall be no access and egress to the site from Gunnersbury Avenue (A406).

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provision of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order), the premises shall be used for a B1a use class and for no other purpose (including any change of use to residential via the prior approval process).
description: Erection of a three storey rear extension to the existing building to comprise the provision of undercroft car parking at ground floor level, additional office floorspace at the first and second floor level and a green roof  at roof level.
